title: Microsoft Toolkit 2.4.6
description:
MTK 2.4.6 by Cody
Microsoft Toolkit - Official KMS Solution for Microsoft Products

MTK 2.4.6 is up. This should fix the 0xC004F074 by using a .NET KMS Server instead of using dirty hacks to hide running of a C++ one.

Also, remember that vbc.exe is no longer used by MTK, so you can stop excluding it when you upgrade AutoKMS and MTK to 2.4.6.



Microsoft Toolkit 2.4.6 Stable

    -Added Windows 8 Embedded Industry KMS keys.
    -Fixed KMS Server Service crash (most common on Windows XP).
    -Removed use of embedded KMS Client for boosting KMS Server                                          
     Client Count on real servers.
    -Unified Windows Embedded product key sections.
    -Using pure .NET KMS Server for activation.
